items.title: All Steps | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for SQL Database Connector. Phoenix connector for automating forensic and ediscovery workflows that use SQL databases. Supports MariaDb, MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and SQLite.

items.title: CreateMsSQLConnectionString Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates an MSSQL connection string. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: CreateMySQLConnectionString Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Create a database connection string for a MySQL database.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: CreatePostgresConnectionString Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a PostgreSQL connection string. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: OpenConnection Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Open a new connection to a database.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: SqlCommand Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Executes a Sql command. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: SqlCreateSchemaFromTable Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a Schema entity from a SQL table. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: SqlCreateTable Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Create a SQL table from a given schema. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: SqlInsert Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Inserts data into a SQL table. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: SqlQuery Step | SQL Database Connector Documentation
items.description: Executes a SQL query and returns the result as an entity stream.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.
